Reviews.Title: Nice computer
Reviews.Author: CEA
Reviews.Content: I like the computer, good price for options such as a decent video card,  but I hate the new operating system. Would prefer XP or 7 over 8.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for the price.
Reviews.Author: M. Absalon "Mosh5"
Reviews.Content: This laptop was very easy to setup and use. I was impressed with the speed and performance. The only irritating part was Windows 8 and the number of software and utilities that were installed by Toshiba which I had to uninstall before giving the laptop to employees.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: roy
Reviews.Content: Great laptop. Getting used to windows8 the only down side is that the speakers arent loud enough for my liking.

Reviews.Title: I love Toshiba
Reviews.Author: G. Lowery "garden unit"
Reviews.Content: I would like this better if it didn't have Windows 8. The specs on this machine are awesome for the price. I am quite happy with this purchase. I have had good luck with Toshiba. I have several old Toshiba machines that continue to be dependable to their abilities.

Reviews.Title: You might want to buy a 5GHZ usb network adapter for this bad boy.
Reviews.Author: Isaac
Reviews.Content: 1.  Love the quad core and generous memory.  Works well.2.  Network card cannot connect to 5ghz routers.  2.4ghz is the limit.  Had to get a USB 5Ghz network adapter.3.  Toshiba phone support charges $69.95 per incident.  Hung up.  Figured out my issue later.  Saved $69.95.4.  Windows 8 is a bear imho.  Downgraded to 7.5.  Downgrading is no picnic.  There is a hardware setting to prevent booting from CD/DVD.  Took a bit to get through that.  Had to repartition the disk since the W8 file system is different than W7.  Got it working.  Not all Toshiba drivers for this laptop are Windows 7 compatible.  Spent the next 3 hours fishing for drivers.  Got it all working in the end - but what a journey.

Reviews.Title: don't like it at all
Reviews.Author: Alla Friedman
Reviews.Content: Didn't have a chane to expirianse yhe produkt ,the mouth pad froze up right after the registration . Very frostrated
